backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user-scoped GST billing data with profiles, business info, customers, items, invoices, and access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs for the GST Pro app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains a brief summary of ProfileSetupDialog.tsx explaining the dialog behavior and prop fix.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the GST Pro React app and mounts it at the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Initializes React Query and router, wraps the app in a theme provider, and mounts global UI components.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout shell providing navigation, header, mobile sidebar, and authentication‑aware UI for the app.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wrapper component that blocks content until the user is authenticated via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/customers/Custom: Dialog form for adding or editing customers, handling validation, mutation calls, and toast notifications.
Displays a customer list with edit and delete actions, including a confirmation dialog and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/invoices/Invoice: Interactive table for managing invoice line items, allowing item selection, quantity/price updates, and row add/remove.
Shows a badge indicating whether an invoice is in draft or finalized status.
frontend/src/components/items/ItemFormDi: Dialog form for creating or editing items with validation, mutation calls, and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/items/ItemsTable: Renders a list of items with edit and delete options, plus loading and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting first‑time users to enter and save their profile name before proceeding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile using the backend actor with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on business profiles, customers, items, and invoices via an actor interface.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, and print-specific overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CustomersPage.tsx: Displays a searchable customer list with add and edit functionality using a table and form dialog.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows invoice stats, business setup status, and quick actions on the main dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays detailed invoice info with totals and actions for editing, finalizing, deleting, and printing.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceEditorPage.tsx: Invoice creation/edit page that loads data, manages form state, calculates totals, and saves invoices.
frontend/src/pages/InvoicePrintPage.tsx: Print-friendly invoice view that loads invoice data, calculates totals, and triggers browser print.
frontend/src/pages/InvoicesPage.tsx: Lists invoices with customer names, statuses, actions, and navigation to create or view invoices.
frontend/src/pages/ItemsPage.tsx: Displays searchable list of items and opens a dialog for creating or editing item entries.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Form for viewing and updating business profile and invoice numbering settings.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's route structure and maps pages to their URL paths.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Provides a helper for formatting numbers as INR currency.
frontend/src/utils/gstCalculations.ts: Computes invoice totals including discounts, GST breakdowns, and inter/intra-state logic.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceNumbering.ts: Formats invoice numbers using business profile prefix and starting sequence.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceRules.ts: Contains rules for determining invoice deletability and related error messaging.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, including GST Pro feature requirements, versions, and image needs.
